wikipedia.title: Gucci Gucci
wikipedia.extract:
"Gucci Gucci" is the lead single from American rapper Kreayshawn's debut studio album, Somethin' 'Bout Kreay (2012). It was released on June 14, 2011 by Columbia Records.
The song was produced by DJ Two Stacks, who added the high hats and Adeptus. It contains a sample of another Kreayshawn song, "Bumpin Bumpin". "Gucci Gucci" peaked at number 57 on the  US Billboard Hot 100. The hip hop track was also a hit in Belgium, and charted on hip hop charts in the United Kingdom. A remix was released featuring British rapper Giggs. By 2012, the single had been certified gold by the Recording Industry Association of America. British singer Neon Hitch covered the song.
